name: gold lattice teapot necklace
description:
a tiny ceramic tea pot with a lovely gold latice design and a gold plated chain.

tinkers tea! that's what my gran used to call a cup of tea made in a cup without pot. if you love a proper cup of tea made in a teapot over a dunk in a cup then this necklace is for you.....you'd better go and get the kettle on!

this is the perfect gift for any one who enjoys a cuppa. young or old any one can enjoy this beaautifully decorated piece.

Made from:

glazed ceramic teapot, 2 cm x 2 cm.  
gold filled 18 inch trace chain chain. 

this is a limited edition piece, once they are gone they are gone so hurry to get this beautiful piece in your collection.

Dimensions:
teapot pendant 2 cm x 2 cm

18 inch gold filled trace chain

Enter YIPEEE at the checkout for free delivery x x

name: gold lattice cup and saucer ears
description:
cup and saucer earrings

made from glazed ceramic these beautiful earrings will catch everyones eye as they hang from your lovely lobes!

they are decorated with a beautiful gold lattice or flower garden design on a white ceramic base.

they hang from silver plated ear wires which contain no nickel so for those of us with sensitive ears they will be completely fine.

measuring 10mm cups and 18mm plates

they comes in a little box that includes a tea bag so you can sit back and enjoy a cuppa whilst admiring your new favourite piece of jewellery

name: vintage clock
description:
these beautiful vintage plate clocks will look fantastic in your bedroom, kitchen or above your little table that you like to drink tea at.

each clock is completely different.  once your order has been place we will send an email with images of the plates we have in stock and the options of hands you can have. 

the clock uses "EZ" Quartz Clock movement.  each movement use the new silent sweep technology which is more robust and exceptionally quiet running.

clocks measures between, 10cm and 22cm.  

the clock will need one single AA battery.

name: plate stand
description:
this stand will be a great help in the kitchen, bathroom or bedroom.  it is the perfect holder for your party nibbles and dip.  your mascara, blusher and eye liner.   your hair bands, kerbies and brushes, or your rings, earrings, brooches and necklaces.  

it is made from a side plate, saucer and cup, all from different sets but perfectly combined to make a lovely piece to display your bits and bobs or just to look pretty about the home.

each stand is hand made in scotland with vintage fine bone china.  because the stands are made from odd crockery each piece will be different.  

if you require a particular colour way please get in touch and specify whether you would like, a pink set, rose set, gold set or whatever particular colour way you need for your room's colour scheme. otherwise you will receive a stand from my current collection.

each stand is made from 2 plates and 1 cup.  the handle is gold coloured metal.  the stand comes flat with instructions for easy assembly - it's very easy, honestly.

the sizes vary but are around 22cm across the base plate and 34cm high

name: spout hook
description:
the perfect gift for tea lovers! 
the ceramic glazed tea pot spout hook is the stylish and ideal way to hang up your tea towels in the kitchen. 
the hook is glazed white ceramic, it sits at 9cm high and 8cm wide, it has a sticky pad on the back so it can be attached to any dry and dust free surface. 
use it in the kitchen to hang your oven glove or your bedroom to hang your jewellery. 
the tea pot spout hook is versatile and can be used to hang up any light weight item.
have a look at www.spouthook.co.uk for more related products and gifts.

name: personalised spout hook chalk board
description:
The kettle's always on at your best friend's house, your mum's house, the smith's or aunt fanny's. Personalise the chalkboard to suit any tea lovers home. You name it and we'll write it!

Made in scotland this handy blackboard will look fantastic in your hall, kitchen or study. Use the board to write down important dates and the spout hook to hang your keys, your tea towel or your calendar on.

The board is hand screen printed and then personalised with permanent pigment. It incorporates a hand cut oak chalk holder and a tea pot spout hook.

The board is 15mm thick, 59.5 cm tall x 39.5 cm wide

The chalk holder is 9.5 cm x 3 cm x 2 cm

The spout hook is bolted on and measures 8 cm x 9 cm x 5 cm

The board has two brass fixings to screw it securely onto your wall.

To personalise your black board please add your name(s) into the box titled 'INSTRUCTIONS FROM BUYER' on the payment page of pay pal.  

If you have any problems or questions please send us an email at purse@louisebuchan.com

name: peachy card wallet
description:
the new peachy range is here.....

made from the softest nappa leather Peachy Card Holder is just dreamy.

the card holder is made in-house in scotland using mint, peach and mink coloured leather and is lined with soft lilac wool felt.  peachy has a very trendy white pyramid rivet on the front cover to keep you bang up to date with the latest trend.

Peachy Card Holder is beautifully fashionable with soft pastel colours so she will go with any outfit in your spring wardrobe. 

measuring 7.5 cm x 10 cm, 16 cm opened out flat.

she has 3 sections to hold your cards, with a cut away on the mint section for easy access to cards that you need regularly.

name: peachy purse
description:
the new peachy range is here.....

made from the softest nappa leather Peachy Purse is just dreamy.

she is made in-house in scotland using mint, peach and mink coloured leather and is lined with soft lilac wool felt.

Peachy Purse is beautifully fashionable with soft pastel coulours so she will go with any outfit in your spring wardrobe. 

she has two handy pockets sitting back to back with each other so you can keep your cards on one pocket and your cash in the other.  the pockets are even large enough to fit your smart phone in.

there are two handy zip pulls so you can access your money easily. 

she measures 15 cm long and 9.8 cm high.

name: a present for someone
description:
treat your loved one to a fantastic goodie bag including leather purse, necklace and ring and save £23!

choose from........

cup o coppers purse in caramel leather measuring 11cm x 11cm. the purse is made from recycled leather and is hand made by louise in south east london. it will keep your change safe for your next cup of tea. you will also receive a green and gold cup and saucer ring with a gold plated adjustable ring base along with a green and gold cup and saucer necklace with a 9 carat gold 18 inch chain.

or 

choose the brown cup of coppers purse with a silver spotty silver plated ring, a silver spotty cup and saucer necklace with a sterling silver 18 inch chain. 

all our jewellery comes with its own tea bag so you can sit down, put your feet up and drink a hot cup of tea whilst admiring the lovely present you have just received.

the gas bag has an outer pocket for your phone and wallet.  it has a drawstring top and one large inside pocket that is lined with cotton.

35 cm length x 21 cm diameter

it comes in sailor blue or dark green.

Part of my new collection inspired by found objects and materials, ‘Creel’ bag is reminiscent of everything earthy, natural and fun. Made from wicker with a pearl print lining and distressed, aged leather handles, it can be comfortably worn over the shoulder or carried by hand.
this wicker woven basket has a leather handle and a cotton printed lining....perfect for the summer!

35cm at it's widest point

name: golden spoon
description:
every girl loves a bit of bling and the golden spoon gives you just that.

it is made in-house in south east london and the caramel leather is recycled so you can enjoy this purse without the carbon footprint guilt.  

it has one large pocket for your money, cards and phone and one outer pocket for your travel card and reciepts.

the the golden spoon has a shiny purple tafeta lining that will cheer you up even when your purse is empty.

measuring 18 cm x 12.5 cm.  the outer pocket measures 8.5 cm deep

name: golden wallet
description:

it is made in-house in south east london and the caramel leather is recycled so you can enjoy this purse without the carbon footprint guilt.

it has one large pocket for your phone and cash and a handy line of slots for your cards on the front.  

the purse folds in half and neatly snaps closed with two magnetic fastners.

the golden wallet has a shiny purple tafeta lining that will cheer you up even when your purse is empty.

A soft leather penny pouch with a natural rope strap, and delicate metallic spoon screen print on outer.  The Sandy Bag is perfect for carrying a little makeup, some pennies, and your keys.

name: tea cage bags
description:
made from soft recycled scottish leather the new tea cage range is a lovely present for someone special.

hand made in scotland the large bag is perfect for your make-up.  it measures 19 cm along the zip and stands 21 cm tall.  it has a 4 cm gusset making it a great size for carrying make-up.  it has a metal tooth zip and a pink cotton lining.

the smaller purse is great for change, your phone and your lippy.  it measures 13 cm across the zip and stands 16.5 cm tall with a 3.5 cm gusset.  the small purse has a pink cotton lining and a nylon zip.

each purse has a leather pull on the zip to make it easy to open and close.

name: midas pyramid purse
description:
hand made in the UK with recycled materials.

the pyramid purse has had the midas touch!
hand printed purse made from recycled leather with printed cotton lining and nylon zip.
aprox' 15cm x 19cm.
this mary poppins purse is a very practical, you can almost get the kitchen sink in there!

name: pyramid purse
description:
Pyramid purse is very usable, it is great for your cards, money, lip gloss and even your phone!  it's the perfect purse when you don't want to take your bag out, everything can fit in here.  
this purse is made from recycled leather, it has a hand printed silk screen lining and comes in 3 fantastic colour ways, navy sailor, satsuma or wine gum.
it measures:  
zip length: 14.5cm
body length: 18cm
i love this purse i use it every day!

name: midas pyramid shoulder
description:
pyramid bag is made from recycled leather with a cotton screen printed lining. 
Great to throw over your shoulder and leave your hands free for shopping.

Width 26 cms 
Height 31cms 
Strap length 120 cms

name: sweetie clutch
description:
this patent leather clutch bag with contrasting lining will brighten up the worst of days.
measuring 29cm at its widest this bag will carry your phone, purse, lipstick, and pretty much anything else you need for a good night out.
it comes in patent yellow, purple, navy or red with a contrasting mustard spoon on the front.  they also have a pink or blue satin lining to make you smile and you can even have a matching sweetie purse to go inside.

name: sweetie purse
description:
Bright, soft patent leather purses. 

available in a vibrant yellow, purple, red or navy finish

they have two separate inner pockets, perfect for coins in one and cards in the other

they measure 14cm x 10cm, with a gun metal grey frame with a silky pink or blue lining

each purse is made in south east london, and then hand finished in north england by a lovely lady called anna

name: turquoise pearl necklace purse
description:
each purse is made from the softest nappa leather. it has a hand silk screen printed design on the front. the purse has two internal pockets that are lined with hand printed cotton. 
outer material turquoise nappa, inner lining navy printed cotton 
measures 14cm x 10cm

description:
this is a lovely and soft nappa leather purse. 
it has two separate inner pockets, perfect for coins in one and cards in the other. 
it measures 14cm x 10cm 
the purse has a hand printed gold design on the front with a hand printed silky lining. 
each purse is printed and cut in south east london and then hand finished in north england by a lovely lady called anna.
